version_description:
New Features
1. Updated the Guild gameplay and optimized the Guild interface.
- Added Group Quests
- Added Guild Achivement
2. Language and technical bugs fixed.

New Features:
1. Added new skin of Inugami: Defiant Stand
2. Added new packs for beginners
3. Language and technical bugs fixed

New Features
1. Support sending rectangular pictures in chat room.
2. Language and technical bugs fixed.

1. Support sending rectangular pictures in chat room.
2. Language and technical bugs fixed.

Update Includes:

1. Get ready for Onmyoji x Mononoke Crossover Event! The last time!
2. Beware! The Ultimate Orochi is approaching!
3. Beware of the deadly flower! New Secret Zone coming!
4. Brave enough? Here's Test of Courage for you!
5. Test your Courage and Enjoy the Harvest Moon with your Shikigami!
6. Shopkeeper's Benefit comes again!
7. New Skin on Sale!

New skins of Puppeteer "Jade Haori" and Kaguya "Moonlit Bamboo" will be available at the skin store after the update. This skin will be 20% off for the first week only!

Optimization and Problems Solved:

1. Soul Effect Adjustments
2. Shikigami skill adjustments
3. Skill Optimization
4. Experience Optimization
5. Fixed language and technical bugs.
6. Fixed display bugs of some particular skill animations, skill icons, and Shikigami figures.

You can check more details in the notice of the game.

- Onmyoji's 1st Anniversary Event
- User Interface Optimization
- New Shikigami Online - SP Jr. Ootengu and SSR Hakuzosu
- Experience Improvement and Bugs Fixed

Onmyoji 2020 Spring Update: New 2nd Anniversary event arrives!
New SSR Character: Kidomaru
Season of Reunion! SP Shiki Grand Ceremony!

- 3rd Anniversary Events coming!
- Uncollcted SP/SSR guaranteed!
- New SP/SSR Nightveil Higanbana arrives!
- New Beginner Events launches!

Come and Explore more!

- New Event Amulet Rush
- Team up and share MILLION Amulets!
- New Talisman Pass

- New Shikigami SSR Taishakuten
- New Event Final Clash
- New Event Hahakigami Cleanup
